name: mieaa.mcp
description: miEAA 3.0 MCP server for miRNA and precursor enrichment analysis, category discovery, converters, and job monitoring.

tools.name: over_representation_analysis
tools.description: Run miEAA over-representation analysis (ORA) for miRNAs or precursors across supported species.

tools.name: list_enrichment_categories
tools.description: List available miEAA enrichment categories for a species and entity type (miRNA or precursor).

tools.name: mirna_precursor_converter
tools.description: Convert between miRNA names and precursor names using miEAA utilities.

tools.name: mirbase_version_converter
tools.description: Convert miRNA identifiers between different miRBase versions.
